name: Apocalypse (itch) (sakuraGameDev)
description: Phoenix is stuck on an island with 3 deadly robots. He has a gun, but that's not all. The robots can deflect any bullets and the only way to hurt them is come near. But you must be very careful as, if you get really near, they can use their electronic field to end you once and for all. And if two of them team up against you, F. This game is all about being at the accurate position while shooting and remember, the enemies have legs, or more precisely tires, so you gotta keep moving while maintaining the right distance. And oh yeah, fire. Remember to fire, because even if you get onto the exact place, without firing, they won't die.
